page.title: 12PARKS NEAR CHILDS HILL
page.content: There are three main parks near Childs Hill school. {Basing Hill Park} opens at 7.00am. It has a slide, a swing, see-saws and tennis courts. There are only a few flowers but many trees like silver birch, oaks etc. Many people go there to jog as there is a lot of space. the grass is short and we have our school sports day there. {Childs {Hill Park}is similar but it is bigger and has a bowling green where mostly old people play. There are football goals as well. Rounders, netball and cricket are also played there. We can ride our bikes too. There is a lot to see in{Golders Hill Park.}There are animals like llamas, deer and goats. there is a lot of woodland where squirrels and rabbits can be seen. there are two little bridges over a pond where swans, ducks and flamingoes live. There's a bandstand and cafe too
